description: Novotek AB engages in the provision of industrial, information technology, and automation solutions. The company is headquartered in Malmo, Skane and currently employs 112 full-time employees.  The firm specializes in developing products, which enable users to collect, analyze, store and manage the production processes. Its product portfolio comprises five categories: Kepware, a platform, which connects a range of devices through Object Linking and Embedding for Process Control (OPC); Plant Information, which provides systems for optimization of production processes, such as Proficy Plant Applications and Proficy Historian; Plant Execution, offering solutions for production control, including Proficy Batch Execution; Operator Interface, providing complementary tools for management, such as Proficy Pulse; and Control, supplying a range of controllers, input/output (I/O) and programming tools, such as PACSystems. Furthermore, the Company is a parent of Novotek Sverige AB, Novotek Cloud Service Solutions AB, and Novotek GmbH, among others.
naics: Computer Systems Design and Related Services
name: Novotek AB
